import React, { useContext } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { JobContext } from '../store/JobContent' import Job_list from './jobs/job_list' function Jobs(props) { const [jobs, setjobs] = useContext(JobContext) return ( <>
{jobs.map((job)=>( ))}
id title company place time
) } Jobs.propTypes = { } export default Jobs
